entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one writing his letter to Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the recipient of Harry's letter and is also mentioned in the context of the Triwizard Tournament.

relationships.description: Harry is writing a letter to Sirius, as mentioned in the text: 'Dear Sirius...'
Hermione is assisting Harry by giving him a piece of parchment and a quill to write his letter, as mentioned in the text: 'Hermione gave Harry a piece of parchment, a quill, and a bottle of ink...'

Harry is participating in the Triwizard Tournament, as mentioned in the text: 'I don’t know if you’ve heard, but the Tri-wizard Tournament’s happening this year and on Saturday night I got picked as a fourth champion.'
Sirius is mentioned as someone who told Harry to keep him posted on what’s happening at Hogwarts, as mentioned in the text: 'You told me to keep you posted on what’s happening at Hogwarts...'
